name: TOBOR
description:
UNVEIL THE MYSTERY


Undercroft is full of weird mysteries! Yes, it's a weird game.
Find out what's happening in Undercroft and report back to HQ agent.
Oh, and make sure you survive too.

YOUR CHOICES MATTER


Your choices can change the story inside the surveillance camera.
And the outcome of your survival depends on your choices.
Just remember this,
1) DO NOT EMPATHIZE.
2) DO NOT INTERFERE.
3) DO NOT BETRAY RA.

MULTIPLE ENDINGS


You have 16 surveillance feeds that run in real-time and it's impossible to watch them all. All the feeds tell a different story and you decide which feed you want to watch. Enjoy listening to what the subjects are saying and scanning objects to retrieve intel of Undercroft. Based on the intel you have gathered, make difficult choices that will eventually change the future of the subjects.
